title: Credit Card Interest in One Minute
content: Paying only the minimum keeps you in debt longer. Try to pay your balance in full to avoid high interest charges.

title: What is a HYSA?
content: A High Yield Savings Account (HYSA) offers higher interest rates than traditional savings accounts. They are a great place to park your emergency fund.

title: 50/30/20 Rule
content: Allocate 50% of your income to needs, 30% to wants, and 20% to savings. This guideline helps you balance your spending and saving goals.

title: Start Investing with $10 a Week
content: Even small, consistent investments grow significantly over time thanks to compound interest. Starting early gives your money more time to grow.

title: Festival Budgeting
content: Plan ahead for celebrations like Diwali, Lunar New Year or Spring Break. Allocate a small savings each week to your festival fund so you can enjoy without overspending.

title: Sending Money Home
content: If you send remittances to family abroad, set aside a percentage of your income each month. Use low-fee transfer services and schedule transfers right after payday to avoid last-minute stress.

title: Save with Friends
content: Start a saving circle with trusted friends. Each week or month, everyone contributes a set amount. The group can support a member in need or fund shared goals like travel or club events.
